Name: Eva Reynes
About the game: Features: - Walk in the footsteps of the legendary Eva Reynes and unveil the truth in this journey filled with mystery, heartbreak, sarcasm and premium whisky. - Unique personalities, complex and unpredictable plots, and a captivating story. - Investigate crime scenes, search for clues, make deductions and find out the truth. - Engage in timed discourse battles: shake up your opponent, point out contradictions using the evidence you've found, or use deception and play dirty. - Manage and develop skills/traits such as Personality, Perception and Discourse. - Original content and artwork. - Several bad endings, one normal ending and one true ending.
